description:
All treasure needs a map to be found. Your greatest treasure is your own life. If you've ever wondered what do with your life, this lesson will teach you how to open your mind and focus on the objectives, resources and actions you need to take for your life project.

Summary:

This lesson will take you through your main personal and professional goals. You'll think about what resources you'll need and what actions you'll have to take in order to obtain those resources. You'll visualize all your objectives, resources and actions on the "map of your life" -this is what you'll have at the end of the lesson.

Objectives:

• To think about your future.

• To orient yourself toward your goals.

• To understand the differences between what's important and what's urgent.

Tips:

• Think about the questions that arise in this lesson.

• To make the map of your life, follow the suggested steps in the downloadable material.
title: Where I am and where I want to go (The Map of My Life)
